org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.mean

Class MeanItemBasedItemRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemBasedItemRecommender
      • org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.mean.MeanItemBasedItemRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.lenskit.api.ItemBasedItemRecommender

    public class MeanItemBasedItemRecommender
extends org.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemBasedItemRecommender
    An item scorer that scores each item with its mean rating.

    • Constructor Summary

      MeanItemBasedItemRecommender(ItemMeanModel m)
      Construct a mean global item scorer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeanItemBasedItemRecommender

        @Inject
public MeanItemBasedItemRecommender(ItemMeanModel m)
        Construct a mean global item scorer.

        The @Inject annotation tells LensKit to use this constructor.

        Parameters:
        m - The model containing item mean ratings. LensKit will automatically build an ItemMeanModel object. Its use as a parameter type in this constructor declares it as a dependency of the mean-based item scorer.

                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> candidates,

                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> exclude)
        This is the LensKit recommend method. It takes several parameters; we implement it for you in terms of a simpler method (recommendItems(int, LongSet)).
